review: Have used minimally so far, but have been very satisfied with options and wide variety.  I do plan to visit a friend soon and wondered if I could use the Fire Stick there - internet/wi-fi is available.  It would be a great chance for Amazon to "spread the word" to potential new customers, if so.
author: L Bea

review: Easy to install and works well.
author: Jeff

review: I love this device. I just wish the remote had an off button
author: marilyn gentilly

review: This is a piece of s***.  I DO NOT RECOMMEND ANYONE TO BUY THIS !  I'm an Amazon Prime customer.  most movies cost extra, number One.  but doesn't matter, because this stick hardly works.  I hate it.  do not buy
author: GEORGIA GRIFFIN

review: Would not work with Xfinity Arris router.  I worked with your tech support people and they could not make it work.
author: TomofNorthwoods
